title: Monitor goes into powersave when game starts
body: Every time I try and start a game it starts up the second game window just fine and then poof my monitor gives me the at rest window with a floating box saying "out of Range" I can still here the game running thru my speakers and the pc is running as usual I can even hear my footsteps and such I just get no video.  ive tried hextech tool and repatching and this is the only game that gives me trouble. I can run other mmo's mobas etc with no issues. any and all help would be welcome.  Aalstone

replies.body: This out of range issue was a recent problem for some players, and the workaround was to swap out of fullscreen by pressing Alt+Enter.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into your specific issue to see why it's still happening to you.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs and attach it to the ticket for context.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
